creator: markt@apache.org
text:
You need to build from source.

If the ASF provides binaries, it is done as a convenience only.

creator: sambhra@amazon.com
text: How do I build it from source?

We produce source code. Binaries are for user convenience.
Because there are so many os/os-version/cpu combination we will provide
only Windows binaries starting from 1.2.32
creator: mturk@apache.org
sambhra@amazon.com
text: Is there any workaround? How do we use it in 32 bit linux m/cs?
To repeat: build it from source.  Download the source bundle, untar it, and follow the directions included in the package.
creator: chuck.caldarale@unisys.com
